vecUnachieved.strDescription: Finish last in a Party Mode game.
Safely deploy all the fire extinguishers. For safety.
Use the cake knife to defend yourself from wedding guests.
Make peace with a gaggle of swans. Their natural instinct is to kill.
Have sex in the Date Night graveyard.
Good at video games. Terrible at sex.
Die a lot of times in your nightmares.
Be the only one locked out of an ouroborus.
Collect enough milk to fill the tank.
Learn how to literally just navigate the main menu.

data.strFullDescription:
Genital Jousting is an online and local multiplayer party game about flaccid penises and wiggly anuses for up to eight players at once. Players control a detached penis complete with testicles and an anus. Multiple game modes provide a stimulating orgy of objectives: penetrate and be penetrated as fast as possible or compete in absurd, silly and sexually suggestive games and challenges. 

[b]New Story Mode[/b]
Play as John, a dick who wants to find a date for his high school reunion. He'll need some help along the way. He's wobbly, he's soft. But he wants to be hard. So very hard. He wants to show everyone his astounding rigidity. And with your help, that's exactly what he'll do.

[b]Features[/b]

[b]If this is something that makes you uncomfortable or sounds unappealing, please do not purchase or play Genital Jousting, or even continue reading. [/b]
[b]
Online and Local Multiplayer for Eight:[/b] Genital Jousting is more fun with friends and can satisfy up to eight players at once! Find a few willing partners, cuddle up on the couch, and share controllers or go online to joust with anonymous players from all over the world.
[b]
Traditional and Party Modes:[/b] Dabble in the throbbingly fast-paced Traditional Mode or jostle your way through some stiff competition in Party Mode including challenges like Double Delight, Obstacle Intercourse, and Weiner Round Up. 

[b]Customize Your Member:[/b] Genitals come in all shapes and sizes so pick your favorite color and decorate it with the most appealing outfit to customize a penis you can really get behind!
data.strSnippet: Genital Jousting tells the story of "John", a penis who needs to find a date for his high school reunion. Genital Jousting is also an online and local multiplayer party game about flaccid penises and wiggly anuses for up to eight players at once.
